titles.title: Small Business Banking Improvement Act
To facilitate transfers between interest-bearing accounts and transactions accounts at depository institutions for small businesses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 2/14/2000--Introduced. Small Business Banking Improvement Act - Amends Federal banking law governing interaccount transfers to provide that a depository institution may permit owners of certain interest or dividend paying accounts to make a specified number of transfers monthly for any purpose to their other accounts in the same institution.
